desc.cn: 一个 `git` 命令的终端 UI
desc.en: A simple terminal UI for `git` commands

darwin/port.cmd: sudo port selfupdate && sudo port install lazygit

debian/curl.cmd:
LAZYGIT_VERSION=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/jesseduffield/lazygit/releases/latest" | grep -Po '"tag_name": "v\K[^"]*')
&& curl -Lo lazygit.tar.gz "https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit/releases/latest/download/lazygit_${LAZYGIT_VERSION}_Linux_x86_64.tar.gz"
&& tar xf lazygit.tar.gz lazygit
&& sudo install lazygit /usr/local/bin

&& sudo dnf install lazygit

opensuse-tumbleweed/zypper.cmd:
sudo zypper ar https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/languages:/go/openSUSE_Factory/devel:languages:go.repo
&& sudo zypper ref && sudo zypper in lazygit

opensuse-leap/zypper.cmd:
source /etc/os-release
&& sudo zypper ar https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/languages:/go/$VERSION_ID/devel:languages:go.repo
&& sudo zypper ref && sudo zypper in lazygit

(win|wsl2)/scoop.cmd:
x scoop bucket add extras
&& x scoop install lazygit

gentoo/emerge.cmd:
sudo eselect repository enable cova
&& sudo emaint sync -r cova
&& sudo emerge dev-vcs/lazygit
